Class BumpingTurtle

  • java.lang.Object
    • BumpingTurtle

  • public class BumpingTurtle
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is our NEW Turtle class that has added features

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BumpingTurtle()
      Default settings tied to each Turtle NOT sick, size = 5, ticks = 0, speed = 20 countDown = 5, timesSick = 0, Color = white

        public void setHeading(Heading a)
        Sets the heading of the turtle. This occurs after the actual change has taken place, so calls to t.getHeading() will return the heading.
